title: Quarkus 3.2.3.Final released - Maintenance release
content: August is upon us but we are still steadily publishing new Quarkus releases. Today, we released Quarkus 3.2.3.Final, the third maintenance release of our 3.2 release train. It should be a safe upgrade for anyone already using 3.2. Note that this version upgrades Hibernate Search to 6.2 as we wanted...
